{{user.name}} {{user.age}} {{user.email}} View Edit delete
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/Services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-table', templateUrl: './user-table.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class UserTableComponent implements OnInit { Users:any; constructor(public myService:UserService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.myService.GetAllUsers().subscribe( { next:(data)=>{ this.Users = data; }, error:(err)=>{console.log(err)} } ) } deleteUser(id: any) { if (confirm(`Are you Sure you want delete user number ${id}`)) { this.myService.deleteUser(id).subscribe( () => this.ngOnInit() , (err) => console.log(err) ); } } }
